item.title: Improved AppPasswords in Nextcloud 14
item.description: The app passwords have been available in Nextcloud for some time now. They were first introduced when we added second factor authentication to Nextcloud, as you still want to have a way to connect your mobile and desktop clients to your account. In the early days this was all manual labor. In the last year we have added support for app passwords to our mobile clients and the desktop client is following soon.
